name: MSc Marketing Science
description:
The fast pace of digital disruption is transforming how marketing functions. Marketing technology not only automates and streamlines decisions, but also provides new means to reach and engage with target audiences. In light of the resulting challenges
 and opportunities, the Master of Science (MSc) in Marketing Science (MMS) programme at Nanyang Business School will prepare you to join the next generation of leaders in the marketing world. ​
MMS is a one-year, full-time programme that is designed to develop comprehensive marketing expertise with the latest thinking, techniques, and tools. Our curriculum delivers the fundamental knowledge of marketing and consumer insights together with
 the latest knowledge on marketing technology to empower you to lead marketing campaigns in this digital era.
​The MSc Marketing Science programme at Nanyang Business School (NBS) is a well-rounded Master’s course designed to cultivate marketing leaders who possess both in-depth knowledge of marketing and an understanding of state-of-the-art marketing technology
 (martech).
Today’s companies are increasingly aware of the value of new technology such as data analytics, and artificial intelligence in developing more effective, intelligent marketing. This intensive, academically challenging programme focuses on developing
 a holistic understanding of marketing through comprehensive, up-to-date knowledge of consumer insight and technology, with unique modules that incorporate cutting-edge marketing techniques and real world experience.
​
One Of Asia's Top Business Schools
NBS’ MSc in Marketing Science programme is conducted at Nanyang Technological University (NTU Singapore). NBS is ranked among Asia’s top business schools and is among a select few in the world to be recognised by both the AACSB and
 EQUIS global accreditation bodies.

In addition,
                        guest lectures by industry leaders as well as projects and field experiences offered by companies provide you with unique industry insights and perspectives​.Culturally DiverseGlobally connected in the heart of Asia, Singapore offers an educational experience that is vibrant and diverse.                     succeed in the global economy. You can also look forward to learning alongside Singapore-based and international students who will enrich the classroom with their varied cultural perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences.Jumpstart Your Career In MarketingThe programme will arm you with a comprehensive marketing toolkit that will empower you to spearhead effective business campaigns and provide added value to your company. You will also have access to a wealth of networking opportunities
                    through our strong industry partnerships and our more than 50,000-strong global alumni community.
